attributes.action: Give Mr George Michael a Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that George Michael is an exceptionaly talented man and has always been dedicated to entertaining his fans. He has sold over 100 million albums worldwide and has won best male vocalist on numerous occassions. He has also won three Ivor Novello awards for Song Writer of the Year as well as Oustanding Contribution to Music award. He has used his music to generously help raise millions of pounds for charity and performed at the most prestigious concerts in recent years. After over 25 years he still remains the most played artist on British radio. His live peformances are outstanding and he is a credit to our country.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
